James always wanted to be fat but he was afraid that he would be made fun of so he never tried.
He had a summer job as a lab worker at the local university. Mostly he just swept and polished the machines in the lab.

"I wonder what this does." says James checking out the remote. Sudenly, James accidently hit a button, the circle opened up, and the next thing James new he was falling.

After a little while of falling James saw abright light and then he stopped falling. He had landed on something soft and warm. James looked around and realized he was in his room.

"Hey will you get off of me?" Came a voice from the big cushion he had landed on. It sounded just like his voice.

Then he realized that he had landed on someones stomach!

"Oh I'm sorry. I don't how I..." As he got off he saw the face of the person he landed on. Only he saw himself looking back!! The guy looked exactly like James only he was incredibly fat!

"I'm James. Who are you?" said James.

"Well here in Blubberberg, being fat is good for you and is considered attractive." said big James.

"Wow its just the opposite in my world. I think I'm going to like it here." says James.

"Well, what to we do now?" asked Lisa.

"We could eat more and be even fatter or explore this place" said James.

Lisa rubbed a hand appreciatively across her generous belly. "I vote we go and explore," she said. "Let's see some more of this cool new dimension."

As they happily waddled towards the doors of the hospital, one of the nurses who had been tending them hurried up behind them.

"James and Lisa, before you go out, you'll want to take a look at these," the nurse said. She handed them a city map, a pair of bus passes, a tourism guide and a wallet with two small plastic cards. "You might want to go to the City Hall first and register," she went on, "the doctor has already spoken to the mayor about your status and the city will help you."

"Cool," said Lisa, "and what about shopping?"

"Those charge cards are tied to a city account," the nurse said. "They'll let you buy a bit - new clothes," she said, indicating their very plain hospital-issue duds, "a few meals, a hotel for the night. But you must talk to the mayor soon."

"Thanks!" said James, and the newly fattened couple continued their weighty progress out of the hospital. The first thing they noticed was there seemed to be no stairs - everything had either ramps or elevators. They walked down the shallow ramp from the hospital entrance to the sidewalk and saw a bus stop a few metres away. Unlike bus stops in their old world, though, this one had a number of comfy benches about it, most occupied by one or two people - a few were smaller than James and Lisa, but most were about their size, and some were much bigger.

"So," said James, "city hall first, or shopping?"

"Shopping!" said Lisa enthusiastically. "I'm not meeting the mayor wearing this old thing!"

"Right," said James. As he spoke a bus drew up to the stop, and threw open its broad doors. The driver inside beamed as the other passengers boarded. James and Lisa approached the door, and Lisa noticed that the driver was fatter than James - a lot fatter than James. The bus was adapted to him though - the steering wheel was very small, and set off to right, so it didn't interfere with his mammoth gut. As James and Lisa boarded, Lisa couldn't help but notice that the bus driver was a lot fatter than even the new, 500 pound James. She asked the driver, "Do you go to city hall, or near a shopping mall?"

The front seats were reserved for those with mobility problems, like city buses back home, and were occupied by a couple of folks who looked like they'd make the 'Guinness Book of World Records' back home as being the fattest folks in the world.

As the bus rolled along, they were clearly headed downtown - the buildings got taller and taller, though there didn't seem to be a lot of traffic, except that there were a lot of buses. Soon, the bus pulled up on one side of a large city square, with a big statue and a large water fountain in the centre, and a very traditional New England-looking city hall on one side. On the other side, a towering block announced that it was 'Giant Galleria and Giant Towers phases I-IV'.

James and Lisa got off, and walked through the huge revolving door into the Galleria, where they paused to consult a store plan. None of the store names seemed familiar, though some looked something like a store name back home - 'Robin Baskin' ice cream, for example - and James and Lisa were both puzzled by the lack of Big 'n' Tall or Plus clothing shops. "Of course, James, they wouldn't have Big 'n' Tall shops - everyone here is big!" she remarked.

132.content:
James and Lisa saw a flash of a park full of people, then everything went dark. James opened his eyes, and realised that he was not in the park anymore! He was on his side, in the recovery position. His head hurt! He could see Lisa beside him, on a...bed. A very big bed. The room was dark. James groaned, and rolled onto his back. Looking around he could see a person sitting on a chair near the bed. It was a guy....

"Oh I'm sorry. I don't how we..." James started to say, then a surge of pain went through his head and he closed his eyes. When he looked again, he realised that the person on the chair was a guy - a very big guy! As he looked, the guy spoke.

"Oh good, one of you is waking up. The paramedics aren't here yet, but... do you mind if I turn on a light?"

"Yes," replied James weakly. The huge guy got up, turned on a table to one side of the bed, and James got a good view of him. The face he saw looked like himself!! In fact, the guy looked exactly like James - or like what James would look like if he doubled in weight!

"Wha...who...who are you!" James asked.

"Whoa! Who are you?" asked the large James.

"I'm James. Who are you?" said James.

"I'm James too," the large James said. "How'd you two get here?"

"Well we were working at the lab and I touched a device then there was a noise and vibration and ... there were people in a park and....how did we get here?"

"We carried you in here. You fell out of the sky while some people were having lunch. I carried you and my girlfriend Lisa carried her."

"Her name's Lisa too," James said in a still shocked voice. "How'd you get so big?" he asked. But before the large James could reply, he suddenly remembered that the people in the lab had been trying to find a way to ravel to another dimension. Could he and Lisa have landed IN another dimension! "Where are we. We might have been sent to another dimension!!!"

"You're from another dimension?"asked large James. "Then you must be me, only from YOUR world. Why are you so small?"

"Why are YOU so big?" asked James.

"Well here in Blubberberg, being fat is good for you and is considered attractive." said large James.

"Wow, it's just the opposite in our world. I think we're going to like it here," says James.

"People will stare at you, call you 'freak'," remarks large James. "You'll have to get fat."

"Huh, that should be easy," replies James. "Lisa and I've been on and off diets all the time - GAINING weight should be easy!"

"Oh, you'll have to go on a diet," says large James, concern clear in his voice. "Both of you. Your size is so unhealthy."

"But I don't want to get thinner!" says James.

"Oh, is that what diets do in your world?" asks large James. "Here a diet is for gaining weight, for people who have trouble getting big, who are stuck being skinny. And you two sure are skinny!"

"Us, skinny?"

"You sure are!" remarks large James. He walks over to James and extends a hand to help him up. At close range, James realises that Big James is even bigger than he thought - James guesses Big James must weigh...

Stickiness. They felt sticky all over. It was as if they were drowning in some viscous goo, but before they could black out, a pair of strong arms lifted them to the surface.

Hacking, they wiped the stuff from their eyes and saw a tall figure before them. It was probably a woman, but neither could honestly tell for sure. She complusively brushed her blue bangs away from her face, even though it didn't seem long enough to get in her eyes. She smiled from behind large spectacles.

"Where are we?" Lisa said around a sweet mouthful of whatever the goo was.
"You are in a fattening center," the blue-haired one explained.
"A what?" James asked, scooping goop from his ears.
"A fattening, chewy, caramel center, in fact." They began to notice that, indeed, they were standing in a huge pool of thick caramel. Bluie was sitting on the edge of the pool, which was surrounded by chocolate.
"Would you two mind telling me what you are doing inside of my record-breaking confection?" She grinned wider, but less friendlily.

1331.content:
"We're not sure." James said. "One minute, we were in our lab, the next thing we know, we're here."

"You're scientists?" Blue asked.

"Well, yes." James replied.

"Excellent!" She said, the friendliness returning to her smile. "You'll understand, then, when I tell you that you have landed in my latest experiment."

Lisa had begun to actually slurp the delicious caramel, but this led her to swallow nervously and stop. "Experiment?"

"Oh, that frightened you." Blue said. "Fear not, and please keep eating."

"Eating your experiment?" James asked. "We couldn't do that."

"No, silly." Blue corrected. "This gigantic candy is not the experiment, although it does represent a remarkable triumph. No, the experiment is about capacity. Namely, how much one will eat when surrounded by food. We had intended for people to choose their favorite, but you've landed in the middle of this giant candy, so I guess that will do."

"So you want us to eat as much of this as we want?" Lisa asked.

"Eat the whole thing, if you can." Blue responded. "All the caramel, all the chocolate."

"No one could..." James started, but was interrupted.

"She's right, James!" Lisa exclaimed as she broke off a piece of the chocolate wall and ate it. "This whole thing is edible! And delicious!"

"Go on, James." Blue encouraged. "Try it."

James put his mouth into the caramel and slurped. It was good, quite good.

Blue frowned. "You're delusional. What a predicament."

"You don't understand that you're supposed to be fat?" Blue asked.

"Sure, but what about your health?" Blue asked incredulously.

"Getting fat isn't going to improve that." James said.

"OK." James said. "What do we need to do?"

"Now you're starting to sound like yourselves; that sugar must be kicking in." Blue said. "I'm going to put the two of you in the clinical observation unit, where I can control and monitor your diets. We'll have you looking and feeling better in no time. You're lucky you ended up here."

"What is this place?" Lisa asked, as Blue led them toward a building with rounded edges.

"This is the National Institute for Nutrition." Blue explained. "We spend our days and nights trying to figure out ways to improve the health of the people of Adipos through better nutrition."

"By making them fat." James said.

"No, by making them fatter." Blue corrected, leading them through the front doors.

The place was quiet. In fact, there was no one around at all.

"Where is everybody?" Lisa asked.

"This is the week of the largest nutrition conference on Grelon. I'm the only one here, but that's good. We'll have a chance to put some pounds on you before everyone returns."

"Why aren't you fat?" James asked bluntly.

"I'm not human." Blue responded. "I am an android scientist. I exist to serve the people of Adipos and Grelon and work relentlessly to make them as fat as possible through discovery and innovation. Now, go ahead and clean up while I make some preparations."

13311211.content:
James and Lisa were led to separate rooms. The quarters were reasonably comfortable with modest but oversized furniture and large bathrooms. Each of them felt better after they had washed the caramel off. Clothing awaited them, clean and utilitarian. They returned to a common area, where Blue awaited.

"Take these." She said, handing each of them a pill.

"What are they?" Lisa asked.

"They're an experimental drug designed to maximize fat cell growth and replication. We've found that they're not very effective in people who are already at a healthy weight, but in thin animals, the results were quite good, with animals increasing their weight by 124.7% at one week. I think we can do better with you with round the clock nutrition. You'll take these once per day."

"Wait a minute." James said. "We're not lab rats."

"They're perfectly safe." Blue reassured them. "There were no adverse side effects in our human trials. In fact, they seemed to make people feel calm and happy. They just weren't effective at their intended purpose. I believe they will work well on the two of you."

"But you don't...Lisa, what are you doing?" James said as he watched Lisa take the pill.

"Oh James, this has to be a dream." She said with a wink. "Just take it. You don't want me to get big and fat all by myself, do you?"

James complied.

"Excellent." Blue said. "These next pills are appetite stimulants. You'll receive them twice per day."

They took the pills without question, and Blue left to go get food.

She returned with a cart containing a variety of foods as well as two small tubes.

"Now, tilt your heads back." Blue said.

They did as they were told, but both jumped back when Blue attempted to put the tubes down their noses.

"What the hell are you doing?!" Lisa snapped.

"Placing your feeding tubes." Blue explained. "In addition to whatever you eat, you'll be receiving feedings around the clock through these small tubes. If you just relax, I'll have them in before you know it."

James shrugged his shoulders as he looked at Lisa. They once again complied. After the initial sensation, they soon found that the tubes were fairly unobtrusive. Through long extensions, Blue connected the tubes to outlets in the wall, and a whitish liquid began to flow.

"Now, your jobs are to relax, enjoy yourself, rest, and eat." Blue said. "Especially to eat. The foods and your tube feedings have been designed to deliver optimal calories at all times. When you need more, just ask."

"I don't know about you, James, but I'm hungry." Lisa said, grabbing a cookie from the cart.

James hesitated for just a moment before joining her.

135.content:
James came too, feeling a little groggy. He looked around, and the first thing he saw was Lisa, who looked no better. They were lying on a vast bed of some sort, in a dimly lit room that looked like a bedroom - but the proportions were off. The door, for example, was too wide. Before James can fully come, too, though, the door opens and two people come in.

Well, they're clearly people, but unlike any James and Lisa have seen before. The man has red hair and glasses, and James thinks that his eyes might be blue, but they are buried so far back behind fat cheeks that it is hard to tell. And it is not only the man's face that is fat - he has no neck either, and his shoulders are huge! So are his arms, hugely fat inside a loose tank top that drapes over a pair of exceeding fat pecs and droops down onto a huge gut. The other person is a huge woman, blonde, with green eyes also buried in fat cheeks, and a vast cleavage thanks to two huge breasts that rode just above a huge belly. Her arms were thick with fat too.

"You're waking up!" says the man, "that's good! How do you feel, are you hurt? We'll get you help if you need it, but we didn't want to embarrass you by calling an ambulance unnecessarily."

"Embarrass us? What happened?" James asks.

"Well, you seemed to fall out of the sky beside our picnic. We were just having lunch outside the lab when you literally fell onto the ground beside us. You didn't seem hurt, only dazed, so we hustled you here."

The woman added, "If we'd called an ambulance then the photogs would have seen you and that would have been SO embarrassing for you."
